front.title: Requirements for Solutions that Support MPLS Network Actions (MNA)

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for the development of MPLS Network Actions (MNA) which affect the forwarding or other processing of MPLS packets. These requirements are informed by a number of proposals for additions to the MPLS information in the labeled packet to allow such actions to be performed, either by a transit or terminating Label Switching Router (i.e., the Label Edge Router - LER).
